Title: Never Say Never Again
Writer: Kevin McClory (based on an original story by), Jack Whittingham (based on an original story by), Ian Fleming (based on an original story by), Lorenzo Semple Jr. (screenplay)
Actors: Sean Connery, Klaus Maria Brandauer, Max von Sydow, Barbara Carrera
Plot: A S.P.E.C.T.R.E. Agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.
